body_html:
I get the same error with nn.Embedding() when the vocab size is large (400k) but not when it's small (4k). Is there a fix? I am using (torch version '0.1.12_2'). The ipython kernel side throws these errors:

[A/b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorIndex.cu:321: void indexSelectLargeIndex(TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<long, IndexType>, int, int, IndexType, IndexType, long) [with T = float, IndexType = unsigned int, DstDim = 2, SrcDim = 2, IdxDim = -2]: block: [18,0,0], thread: [64,0,0] Assertion `srcIndex < srcSelectDimSize` failed.
/b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorIndex.cu:321: void indexSelectLargeIndex(TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<long, IndexType>, int, int, IndexType, IndexType, long) [with T = float, IndexType = unsigned int, DstDim = 2, SrcDim = 2, IdxDim = -2]: block: [18,0,0], thread: [65,0,0] Assertion `srcIndex < srcSelectDimSize` failed.

body:
I get the same error with nn.Embedding() when the vocab size is large (400k) but not when it's small (4k). Is there a fix? I am using (torch version '0.1.12_2'). The ipython kernel side throws these errors:

```
[A/b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorIndex.cu:321: void indexSelectLargeIndex(TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<T, IndexType>, TensorInfo<long, IndexType>, int, int, IndexType, IndexType, long) [with T = float, IndexType = unsigned int, DstDim = 2, SrcDim = 2, IdxDim = -2]: block: [18,0,0], thread: [64,0,0] Assertion `srcIndex < srcSelectDimSize` failed.
```
